name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in developing robust solutions using **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React**. Proficient in event-driven systems and **PostgreSQL**, I excel in leveraging clean architectures and domain-driven design principles to build scalable applications. Adept at implementing security and compliance best practices, I ensure adherence to industry standards while maintaining high code quality through effective testing strategies.
In my previous roles, I led cross-functional teams and mentored junior developers, fostering a collaborative environment. My strong communication skills enable me to articulate complex technical concepts clearly, contributing to successful project outcomes. I also possess a comprehensive understanding of full-stack development leveraging **Java** and cloud technologies, enriched by experience in the healthcare and financial sectors.
